original_text:
Oh, let the evil of the wicked come to an end,
    and may you establish the righteous—
you who test the minds and hearts,
    O righteous God!
korean_text: 악인의 악을 끊고 의인을 세우소서 의로우신 하나님이 사람의 마음과 양심을 감찰하시나이다

sentences.original_text: Oh, let the evil of the wicked come to an end,
and may you establish the righteous—
you who test the minds and hearts,
